raw_body: Dearly beloved wife of Piyaratne Pandithakorale, loving mother of Sunali Kandanearachchi and Sumudhu Chandrasekera, loving mother-in-law of Priyantha Kandanearachchi and Srinath Chandrasekera, loving grandmother of Sashya, Rashmika, Devishka, Buvaneshka and Thivanka, loving sister of late Major General C. H. Fernando, late George Fernando, late Dudley Fernando and Malkanthi Kurukulasuriya, peacefully passed away. Remains will lie at 30/52, Longdo
